```{r include = FALSE}
library(DataComputing)
download.file("http://tiny.cc/dcf/ScorecardSmall.Rda",destfile="ScorecardSmall.Rda")
load("ScorecardSmall.Rda")
translations <- read.csv("http://tiny.cc/dcf/NPT4-names.csv")
```
<!-- put your content after this line -->

```{r}
Table1 <- 
  ScorecardSmall %>%
  select(INSTNM,CONTROL,ADM_RATE,TUITFTE,NPT41_PUB,NPT43_PUB,NPT45_PUB,NPT41_PRIV,NPT43_PRIV,NPT45_PRIV) %>%
  gather(key=quintile, value = NETCOST, NPT41_PUB,NPT43_PUB,NPT45_PUB,NPT41_PRIV,NPT43_PRIV,NPT45_PRIV)
```

```{r}
Table2 <- Table1 %>%
  left_join(translations, by=c('quintile'="long_name")) %>%
  filter(CONTROL!=3) %>%
  mutate(ADM_PERCENT = ADM_RATE*100)
  
Table2_public <- Table2 %>%
  filter(CONTROL==1)
  
Table2_private <- Table2 %>%
   filter(CONTROL==2)

```

```{r}
#rename(Table2,c("ADM_Percent" = "Admissions_Rate_%"))
plot1 <- ggplot(Table2_public,aes(x=ADM_PERCENT,y=NETCOST)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~short_name) + 
  xlab("Admissions rate, %")+
  ylab("Net cost per year")+
  ggtitle("PUBLIC")
  

plot2 <- ggplot(Table2_private,aes(x=ADM_PERCENT,y=NETCOST)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~short_name) + 
  xlab("Admissions rate, %")+
  ylab("Net cost per year")+
  ggtitle("PRIVATE NON-PROFIT")

plot1
plot2

```
